core.net

Class Transfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.net.Transfer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadTransfer, WriteTransfer

    public abstract class Transfer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Transfer Runnable transfer moves a file between UDP endpoints. It is left to the subclass to use the appropriate notification function to signal transfer listeners of the different stages of the transfer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transfer(java.net.SocketAddress address, java.lang.String filename)
      Constructs a transfer with a socket which will move the specified file
